::Zardus/Zeus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DeathStorm::

Zardus' eyes widen as he hears the bounty hunters call him by his name.

"There's been a slight change of plans, I'm afraid I don't require your 
services ... At least not yet..." He says and turns back to fire at Set and 
his group.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeus flies forward and then backwards as numerous shots hit him. He falls on 
a boulder, but stands up.

"Sir, I suggest we retreat. Me and my brothers cannot unite unless we are all 
here," he says, turning to fire at Zardus and his group.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica flies into a tree as Zeus' shot hits him. He jumps up, shooting 
back at Zeus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike fires a shot at the middle of Ares' back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm walks out into the clearing, following Nemesis. He was ready for 
battle, his gun and sword drawn.
